relatedRecords.name: GroupBy Conference
relatedRecords.description: Group By offers free online training by the community, for the community. Anyone can submit a session for GroupBy, and community votes on who presents! From Group By Azure to Group By Snowflake, you get to decide the content.

relatedRecords.description: Inspired by the DevTalks network, DevCon is a premium event designed around a 3-days experience where senior IT professionals gather to share their best inputs and experiences and connect to the latest trends in technology and contribute to the future of the tech industry.
